title: Tennis Our Way
brief_description: Presented by Arthur Ashe and Stan Smith who give valuable tips on all aspects of the game, from the fundamentals such as: “Grip”, “Dimensions of the Court” and the “Physical Laws” which govern the ball’s direction to professional tennis tactics.
